arts.ttl: John Eustace issues Derby County verdict after 'emotional' week ends in thrilling Plymouth win
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. John Eustace paid tribute to his "amazing" Derby County after the secured their third successive win of the week with victory at Plymouth Argyle.

arts.ttl: Derby County v Plymouth Argyle player ratings as star man banks 8 in super Rams late show - Leigh Curtis
arts.sum: Derby got off to a terrific start as a long throw into the box from Kane Wilson was flicked on by Nat Phillips who found Harness inside the box. Jacob Widell Zetterstrom: Couldn't really do much about the free-kick that Plymouth scored before half-time which was a wonderful strike.

arts.ttl: Marcus Harness nets late winner as Derby edge win at relegation rivals Plymouth
arts.sum: The visitors went 2-0 up before Plymouth replied with two of their own ahead of the late winner.

arts.ttl: John Eustace drops one change as he names Derby County team to face Plymouth
arts.sum: Derby: Zetterstrom, Wilson, Phillips, Clarke, Forsyth, Elder; Adams, Thompson, Armstrong; Yates and Harness Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone.

arts.sum: April 12: Derby County - H April 26: Derby County - H

arts.ttl: Benched and off the pace - how Derby County's loan players are faring - Derbyshire Live
arts.sum: Striker Tony Weston is also out on loan, this time with National League side Boston United, while Sonny Bradley sealed a departure from Derby to Wycombe Wanderers as he looks to help the Chairboys achieve promotion. Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone.

arts.ttl: Derby County loanee handed Young Lions call-up after impressive form
arts.sum: The midfielder picked up the Player of the Match award for the team's 2-1 victory against Blackburn at Pride Park which drew high praise from head coach, John Eustace who commended the "mature performance". Derby County loanee Harrison Armstrong has earned an England u18s call-up after impressing at Pride Park since joining from Everton in January.

arts.ttl: Mumba in: Plymouth Argyle team news and predicted XI to face Derby County
arts.sum: The latest Plymouth Argyle team news as Miron Muslic’s men prepare to host Derby County in the Championship on Saturday. The post Mumba in: Plymouth Argyle team news and predicted XI to face Derby County appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: EFL legend backs Derby County to beat the drop this season for one reason
arts.sum: English Football League legend, Don Goodman has picked Derby County to avoid relegation from the Championship this season, citing one major factor. “However, back-to-back wins should breed confidence and in John Eustace, they have a man who did it last season at Blackburn, so if I had to pick one out of the three, I’d pin my mast to Derby County.”

arts.ttl: Derby County coach leaves for League One promotion hopefuls
arts.sum: Derby County’s Head of Academy Goalkeeping Ross Atkins has joined Wycombe Wanderers, as announced by the Chairboys’ website.… The post Derby County coach leaves for League One promotion hopefuls appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
